alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 2:22AM HST until December 15 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FOR LANAI AND PORTIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR ALL REMAINING HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... .A cold front will push south of the Big Island this morning. Strong winds behind the front will be particularly gusty over and downwind of mountains and through valleys. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Kauai and Niihau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down holiday decorations and tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong gusts can make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau
